# Timing iterative gene search

```{r iterative-gene-search, message = FALSE}



proc_time_add_genes = function(sce , stat = NULL, genes_base = NULL, assay = "logcounts", n_genes_total = 250, batch , p = 3){
  t0 = proc.time()
  if (is.null(stat)){
    stat = suppressWarnings( get_lp_norm_dist(sce, genes = rownames(sce), assay = assay, batch = batch , n.neigh = 5 , nPC = 50 , genes.predict = rownames(sce) , p = p) )
    colnames(stat) = c("gene" , "dist.all")
  }
  t1 = proc.time()
  t = c(t1[["elapsed"]] - t0[["elapsed"]])
  
  genes_all = genes_base
  while(length(genes_all) < n_genes_total){
    
    stat_genes = suppressWarnings( get_lp_norm_dist(sce , genes = genes_all , assay = assay , batch = batch, n.neigh = 5 , nPC = NULL , genes.predict = rownames(sce) , p = p) )
    colnames(stat_genes) = c("gene" , "dist")   
    stat_genes = stat_genes[!stat_genes$gene %in% genes_all , ] 
    stat_genes = merge(stat_genes , stat)
    
    stat_genes$dist.ratio = stat_genes$dist - stat_genes$dist.all 
      
    idx = which(stat_genes$dist.ratio == max(stat_genes$dist.ratio))
    gene = stat_genes$gene[idx[1]]
    genes_all = c(genes_all , as.character(gene))
    current.t = proc.time()
    t = c(t , current.t[["elapsed"]] - t0[["elapsed"]])
  }
  #out = genes_all
  return(t)
}

n.grid = rev(seq(1000,10000,1000))

samples = unique(sce$sample)
stat = bplapply(n.grid , function(n){
  stat.per_n_genes_init = lapply(c(1:length(samples)) , function(n_samples){
  
    current.sce = retain_only_hvgs(sce[, sce$sample %in% samples[1:n_samples]], n = n, var.thresh = 0)
    rownames.sce = rowData(current.sce)[,2]
    idx = which(!grepl("mt-" , rownames.sce) & !grepl("MT-" , rownames.sce) & !grepl("Mt-" , rownames.sce))
    current.sce = current.sce[idx,]
    
    if (n_samples == 1){
     out = proc_time_add_genes(current.sce , n_genes_total = 250, batch = NULL)
    }
    else {
     out = proc_time_add_genes(current.sce , n_genes_total = 250, batch = "sample")
    }
    current.stat = data.frame(n_genes = seq(0,250,1) , time = out)  
    current.stat$n_genes_init = nrow(current.sce)
    current.stat$n_samples = n_samples
    current.stat$n_cells = ncol(current.sce)
    return(current.stat)
  })
  stat.per_n_genes_init = do.call(rbind , stat.per_n_genes_init)
  return(stat.per_n_genes_init)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
stat = do.call(rbind , stat)

saveRDS(stat , file = paste0(root.dir , "data/processed_time/geneBasis/" , system , "/stat_unparalleled_unbatched.Rds"))
```
